body_html: I'm experimenting with the Differentiable Neural Computer (DNC). And I found out that the model uses reduce_prod heavily in the RNN while loop, which causes very poor performance when training the model. Desperately hope that this feature could be heeded.
body_text: I'm experimenting with the Differentiable Neural Computer (DNC). And I found out that the model uses reduce_prod heavily in the RNN while loop, which causes very poor performance when training the model. Desperately hope that this feature could be heeded.
body: I'm experimenting with the [Differentiable Neural Computer (DNC)](https://github.com/deepmind/dnc). And I found out that the model uses reduce_prod heavily in the RNN while loop, which causes very poor performance when training the model. Desperately hope that this feature could be heeded.
